Crunchyroll




SOULCALIBUR VI Marks Its Launch with Part 2 of Documentary Series
Related Article
paragraph:
Earlier this month we shared the first part of Souls and Swords, a documentary series that dives into the 20-year history of the SOULCALIBUR series. With the October 19 launch of SOULCALIBUR VI, it's time to return to the stage of history in part two.   -------Joseph Luster is the Games and Web editor at Otaku USA Magazine. You can read his webcomic, BIG DUMB FIGHTING IDIOTS at subhumanzoids. Follow him on Twitter @Moldilox.
